boardgame.name: Garden Dice
boardgame.description: Garden Dice is a family strategy game that combines dice rolling, tile laying, and set collection. The game board depicts a garden as a 6x6 grid in which seed and vegetable tiles are placed using dice rolls as coordinates. Players take turns using the dice to plant, water, and harvest five different types of vegetables with differing point values, from the lowly squash to the mighty eggplant._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The game's chaining mechanism allows players to water or harvest multiple tiles using a single action, enabling players to build upon each others' chains. Players can also use bird and rabbit tiles to eat other players' seed and veggie tiles, but not without paying a small penalty. Two other special tiles _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; the sundial and the scarecrow _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; allow players to modify dice rolls or protect their own tiles._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The Gnome expansion included in Garden Dice can be added to the base game to give players the ability to adjust the dice rolls for purchasing, watering, and harvesting their vegetables, leading to a more strategic experience._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Bonuses increase the values of tiles as they are harvested, and additional points are awarded at the end of the game for collecting sets. The player with the most points when the last tile is taken wins._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamehonor: 2014 Games Magazine Game of the Year Winner

listing.notes: This deal is for the Kickstarter special package that includes: One copy of Garden Dice with the a 4x4 burlap dice bag and four sets of colored wooden dice which match the color each players game pieces. Also included is the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;mini-expansion_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; set of four garden gnome tiles and rule set also coordinated to the players game pieces. Seller will pay shipping to the contiguous United States. However, I am willing to ship worldwide with appropriate price adjustments for location based shipping charges. TBD

Seller will pay shipping to the contiguous United States. However, I am willing to ship worldwide with appropriate price adjustments for location based shipping charges and insurance. Exact price TBD.

Meridae Games (MER001) Garden Dice is a strategic dice rolling and tile laying board game for 2 to 4 players, ages 10 and up. The board depicts a garden as a 6 x 6 grid where players place their vegetable tiles using dice rolls as coordinates. Dice are also used to water and harvest the tiles. Special tiles give players additional options and create new game dynamics. At the end of the game, bonus points are awarded for collecting sets of tiles, and the player with the most points after all tiles have been played is the winner. Garden Dice uses simple rules but delivers an unexpected element of strategy. Clever dice usage and tile placement are rewarded and the game features opportunities for symbiotic play. Even seasoned gamers will find something new in Garden Dice.

The board depicts a garden as a 6 x 6 grid where players place their vegetable tiles using dice rolls as coordinates. Dice are also used to water and harvest the tiles. Special tiles give players additional options and create new game dynamics. At the end of the game, bonus points are awarded for collecting sets of tiles, and the player with the most points after all tiles have been played is the winner. Garden Dice uses simple rules but delivers an unexpected element of strategy. Clever dice usage and tile placement are rewarded and the game features opportunities for symbiotic play. Even seasoned gamers will find something new in Garden Dice.

Punched, but never played. Includes colored baggies for the player pieces and the add-on _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;burlap_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; dice bag and extra dice from the Kickstarter. Pristine condition. http://boardgamegeek.com/image/1537281/garden-dice I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m an avid game collector in a smoke-free home and take good care of my games. Unless otherwise noted above, game is complete with little or no shelf wear or damaged components. High-resolution picture available upon request. Domestic US shipping is $12.35 for USPS Priority Mail with tracking (insurance is optional if you want to pay for it). International shipping will be actual price plus USD$5.00 (sorry, it is a much bigger hassle on my end, plus I need to provide the box). Contact me if you have any questions about shipping. Must pay me via PayPal (I will cover the fees). I have many other games up for sale and in most cases I can combine shipping for some significant savings, but please check with me and provide your zip code for details.

I will send this game to the eventual buyer using the Collect Plus courier service. It will be tracked and needs to be signed for upon receipt. Details can be found at www.collectplus.co.uk. Post and packing costs will be: £6.00 delivered to your door, OR £4.50 delivered to your nearest participating dealer for you to collect. (I recommend this, as you do not have to wait in for delivery. An email is sent when it is ready to be collected.) Some places within the UK may have to pay additional postage charges. I will contact you if this is the case. If this does apply you are probably more aware of this than me. European destinations, as listed by Royal Mail, will be £12.00

SELLERS TERMS AND CONDITIONS: PAYMENT TERMS: Payment is due within 2 days of the date you placed the order. Please do not purchase if you do not intend to follow through with the transaction. PAYMENT METHODS: PayPal SHIPPING: Buyer is responsible for all shipping cost. All orders are shipping Priority Mail. RETURNS: All returns require authorization BEFORE returning the item. We will accept returns within 5 days of your receipt of the order. We only accept returns on items which are in their original condition. Original condition means, the game have not been played and all parts are in the same condition as they were when you received the game. We only refund shipping costs if the return is a result of our error. If you refuse delivery of an order, we will deduct the return shipping charge from your refund.
